createOrder(address,address,uint256,uint.details: register new Order to smart contract with infomations of buyer, seller, feeMode, and price.

params._feeMode: the variable who pay the escrow fee, 0 -> seller, 1 -> both
params._orderId: id that saved in the escrow database

hasPerseusToken().details: check if msg.sender has perseus token.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

refund(uint256).details: withdraw the bnb from smart contract by the seller.

release(uint256).details: withdraw the bnb from smart contract by the buyer.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdraw().details: withdraw the bnb from smart contract by the seller.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
